import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function CompanyDashboardHome() { const [companyName, setCompanyName] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { // Fetch the company name from localStorage const storedCompanyName = localStorage.getItem("companyName"); if (storedCompanyName) { setCompanyName(storedCompanyName); } else { setCompanyName("Company"); // Default fallback in case companyName is not available } }, []); return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome,{companyName}!

Here’s an overview of your company dashboard.

{/* Key Metrics Section */}

Active Jobs

5

Active Internships

3

Applications Received

12

Upcoming Deadlines

2

{/* Quick Actions */}

Post a New Job

Go to Post Job

Post a New Internship

Go to Post Internship
{/* Recent Activity Section */}

Recent Activity

  • Job: Frontend Developer posted 2 days ago
  • Internship: Summer Intern posted 1 week ago
  • Application: 5 applications received for Frontend Developer
); } export default CompanyDashboardHome;
